broker.commission_info: You will receive {percentage}% commission upon deal completion

subscription_dialog.title: Owner Property Marketing Service
subscription_dialog.subscribers_only: This request is for subscribers only
subscription_dialog.description: Subscribe to one of our monthly packages to be able to submit service offers for owner properties

marketing_dialog.title: How does the service work?
marketing_dialog.step_1: Start marketing the property and present it to your clients
marketing_dialog.step_2: If you find an interested client, contact the advertising broker
marketing_dialog.step_3: If the deal is completed through your request, you will receive your share of the commission
marketing_dialog.step_4: After receiving your commission share, you will pay the Deal app fee
marketing_dialog.step_5: The agreed commission is the amount the buyer will pay as a commission upon deal completion
marketing_dialog.commission_note: The agreed commission is {percentage}% upon deal completion
marketing_dialog.accept_commission: I agree to pay {percentage}% of my commission share to Deal app
marketing_dialog.accept_terms: Deal app does not bear any responsibility or guarantee for the commission. Receiving the commission from the advertising broker is your responsibility

marketing_dialog.title: Marketing Property
marketing_dialog.confirm_title: Do you want to market this property?
marketing_dialog.confirm_description: Market your property to reach the maximum number of potential buyers
marketing_dialog.benefit_1: Property appears in top search results
marketing_dialog.terms_content_1: By agreeing to market, you agree to the platform's terms and conditions.
marketing_dialog.terms_content_2: The property will be displayed to users according to your subscription package.
marketing_dialog.terms_content_3: You can stop marketing at any time from the dashboard.
marketing_dialog.accept_terms: I agree to the terms and conditions
marketing_dialog.package_required_description: To market a property, you need an active subscription to one of our packages
marketing_dialog.package_cta_text: Subscribe to one of our packages to benefit from marketing features and reach more buyers
marketing_dialog.package_note: Marketing will be activated automatically after subscription
